title: English Slacker
description: A tale of small town teenage life in the mid-nineties. Just before the summer holidays Colin disappears. His best friend Chambers is desperate to find out why but unable to come to terms with the devastating truth. Surrounded by the distractions of drink, drugs and girls he soon finds himself in a downward spiral that puts him in danger of not only losing his mind but questioning his own existence.
author: Chris  Morton
